SEARCH
Module com.github.sttk.cliargs

Package com.github.sttk.cliargs

package com.github.sttk.cliargs
Provides the classes to parse and print comand line arguments.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.github.sttk.cliargs.convert
    Provides the classes to convert option arguments to typed values.
  • Class
    Description
    CliArgs
    Provides the static methods to parse and print command line arguments.
    CliArgs.ConfigHasDefaultsButHasNoArg
    Is the exception reason which indicates that an opiton configuration contradicts that the option has default value(s) (.defaults != null) though it has no option argument (.hasArg == false).
    CliArgs.ConfigIsArrayButHasNoArg
    Is the exception reason which indicates that an option configuration contradicts that the option is an array (.isArray == true) though it has no option argument (.hasArg == false).
    CliArgs.ConfigIsNotArrayButDefaultsIsArray
    Is the exception reason which indicates that an option configuration contradicts that the option is not an array (.isArray == false) but default value (.defaults is an array.
    CliArgs.FailToConvertDefaultsInOptAnnotation
    Is the exception reason which indicates that default value(s) defined in Opt annotation is failed to convert to the specified type value.
    CliArgs.FailToConvertOptionArg
    Is the exception reason which indicates that an option argument is failed to convert the specified type value.
    CliArgs.FailToSetOptionStoreField
    Is the exception reason which indicates that it is failed to set option arguments (including those from default values) to a field of an option store.
    CliArgs.IllegalOptionType
    Is the exception reason which indicates that a type of a field of the option store is neither a boolean, a number, a string, or an array of numbers or strings.
    CliArgs.InvalidOption
    Is implemented by records that indicate exception reasons, and provides a method to retrieve an option name.
    CliArgs.OptionHasInvalidChar
    Is the exception reason which indicates that an invalid character is found in an option.
    CliArgs.OptionIsNotArray
    Is the exception reason which indicates that an option is input with an option argument multiple times though its option configuration specifies the option is not an array (.isArray == false).
    CliArgs.OptionNameIsDuplicated
    Is the exception reason which indicates that an option name in .names field is duplicated another among all option configurations.
    CliArgs.OptionNeedsArg
    Is the exception reason which indicates that an option is input with no option argument though its option configuration requires option argument (.hasArg == true).
    CliArgs.OptionTakesNoArg
    Is the exception reason which indicates that an option is input with an option argument though its option configuration does not accept option arguments (.hasArg == false).
    CliArgs.StoreKeyIsDuplicated
    Is the exception reason which indicates that a store key in an option configuration is duplicated another among all option configurations.
    CliArgs.UnconfiguredOption
    Is the exception reason which indicates that there is no configuration about the input option.
    Cmd
    Is the class which contains a command name, command arguments, and option arguments that are parsed from command line arguments without configurations.
    Help
    Is the class to print a help text with OptCfg objects.
    OptCfg
    Is the class that represents an option configuration.
    OptCfg.NamedParam<T>
    Is the functional interface for the constructor parameters like named parameters.
    OptCfg.Postparser<T>
    Is the functional interface to process option arguments after parsing command line arguments.
    Result
    Is the record class that contains the result of parsing methods.
